article_title: Job Spotlight: Sarah Lang, chief executive officer of Valley Healthcare System
article_text: Sarah Lang is a native of the small West Virginia town of Mount Hope. So perhaps it's appropriate that she has for nearly two decades been offering hope to the less fortunate in the Columbus area in the form of lower-cost medical, dental and vision care.

article_summary:
Sarah Lang is a native of the small West Virginia town of Mount Hope.
So perhaps it's appropriate that she has for nearly two decades been offering hope to the less fortunate in the Columbus area in the form of lower-cost medical, dental and vision care.
